Method Detail

getFormalName

java.lang.String getFormalName()
During contextualization the current state of an indirect observation can be used as a dependency. This returns the formal name that the observation has been assigned. If none has been assigned (using a :as clause in the context statement), this should return the lowercased concept name where any camelcase pattern has been replaced with a dash separator (i.e. MyConcept -> my-concept).

Returns:

getAccessor

IAccessor getAccessor(IContext context)
Return an appropriate accessor to use during contextualization to obtain data in this context.

Returns:
